name: floater
content:
floater noun [C]
(SPOT IN EYE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small spot inside a person's eye that they see moving up and down or from side to side

floater noun [C]
(PERSON)
mainly US someone who does a lot of different jobs in an organization: He had worked as a floater, assigned to any of the fire stations across the county as the need arose.
